title: Letras Latinas 2006 pixs
content:
[Letras Latinas 2006 flickr pix](http://web.archive.org/web/20100828232214/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/46746624@N00/sets/72057594139789886/)

The exhibition finished in Brazi, Chile, Mexico, Peru, Uruguay, Venezuela, Colombia and Argentina last week and is going to TypeCon in august. This pictures were taken by Miguel Angel Vivanco from Chile and they show the 70 works selected over a total of 425 summitions.
author: Ale Paul

comments.content: Really wonderful stuff. And another reason to consider attending Typecon!
A really diverse selection of quality typefaces. I noticed most of the scripts are available through veer, are any of the others available for licensing?

\>\>\>any of the others available for licensing?

which ones and I could contact them with you?

\>\>\>\>And another reason to consider attending Typecon!

I noted they are not the complete 70's (some he missed to add) but you will have them for sure at typecon!
i have posted a link to the flickr set on the german type-blog [slanted.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20100828232214/http:/www.slanted.de/). nice work!

Alejandro, I would be particularly interested in:

- Revolución: Luciano Vergara  
- MelloSans: Fernando de Mello Vargas / Vicente Gil Filho

Chris  
Luciano Vergara mail is syd88syd(at)hotmail(dot)com. Try to contact him.  
I dont know about Fernando de Mello...

Simply gorgeous, too bad I couldn't make it this year into letras latinas either.

Héctor
